sentences.en: He took a small key from his pocket and slowly inserted it into the lock.
sentences.cn: 他从衣袋里掏出一把小钥匙，然后缓缓地将其插入锁孔里。

sentences.en: His hand shook slightly as he inserted the key into the lock.
sentences.cn: 他把钥匙插进锁里，手微微颤抖。

sentences.en: I wish to insert an advertisement in your newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我想在贵报上登一则广告.

sentences.en: If it is the end of the program, we insert the word STOP.
sentences.cn: 如果是程序的结尾则填入停止.

sentences.en: If you can insert your hand between the back of the chair and the wall, you may be able to reach the letter that fell down there.
sentences.cn: 如果你能把你的手伸进靠墙的那把椅子后面, 或许你能够着掉在那儿的那封信.

sentences.en: Insert a small knife into the top of the chicken breast to loosen the skin.
sentences.cn: 在鸡胸上方插进一把小刀，以使鸡皮不要绷得太紧。

sentences.en: Insert coins into the slot and press for a ticket.
sentences.cn: 把硬币放进投币口，按钮取票。

sentences.en: Insert the fork about 6in. from the root and simultaneously lever it backwards.
sentences.cn: 将耙子插入到离根部约6英寸的地方并同时向后扳。

sentences.en: Insert the special cleaning thread between your teeth and pull it gently up and down.
sentences.cn: 把这条特制的棉线嵌在牙齿间,然后轻轻地上下移动.

sentences.en: Insert the thin end of the wedge.
sentences.cn: 打进楔子尖,(比喻)微微突破一点(以便慢慢扩大作用).

sentences.en: Insert your fingers between the layers and press them apart.
sentences.cn: 把手指插入两层之间,用力将之分开.

sentences.en: Is it too late to insert a new page into my magazine article?
sentences.cn: 往我在杂志上发表的那篇文章中再加上一页晚不晚?

sentences.en: Later, he inserted another paragraph into his will.
sentences.cn: 后来他在他的遗嘱中又加了一段。

sentences.en: Programmers will unilaterally insert buck - passing code in these places, almost without noticing it.
sentences.cn: 程序员将不知不觉地单方面地在这些位置插入推卸责任的代码, 这种趋势应当得到密切关注.

sentences.en: Selections like View, Insert , Format , Tools, and Options sound like tools and functions, not goals.
sentences.cn: 像“视图” 、 “插入” 、 “格式”和“选项”这样的选择听上去像工具和功能, 而不是目标.

sentences.en: The magazine contains a special insert about holidays abroad.
sentences.cn: 这本杂志有一张关于国外度假的特别插页.

sentences.en: The newspaper had an insert of pages of pictures.
You have to insert an additional piece of material into the waistline of the dress to make it large enough for her.
sentences.cn: 你还得添块布料加宽这件女装的腰部,这样她穿上就合身了.

trans.tran_cn: 添入物（尤指一页印刷品图中插入或套印的小图），（书报的）插页，插入物，添加物
trans.tran_en: something that is designed to be put inside something else
to put something inside or into something else

trans.tran_cn: 插入，嵌入，（在文章中）添加，加插
trans.tran_en: to put something inside or into something else
